ygData.subject: Money and Experience
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi again all... I am presently running around in Crushbone, taking on the occasional Legionnaire that happens to walk by, and I began wondering how I
ygData.messageBody:
Hi again all...<br><br> I am presently running
around in Crushbone, taking on the occasional
Legionnaire that happens to walk by, and I began wondering
how I could make more money while still developing my
skills. The only problem is where you can make money is
also mostly crowded, so money is still rare.
<br><br>Does anyone have an idea where a 14th circle Bard can
find some good money while still getting halfway
decent experience? I fought in unrest while I was 13,
and the loot there is ok, but the trip through
dagnor's is a bit unsettling, as well zas the deadly part
of being in unrest as a 14 circle bard..
(hehe)<br><br>Any ideas other than the Desert?<br><br>Thanks in
advance..<br><br>Telryn Firemane<br>14th circle Songweaver of Erollisi
Marr<br>Wandering Minstrel and Leader of Gens Lupus
